name: Tank Shooter (altaf-creator)
description:
Welcome to Tank Shooter! Tank shooter is a pixel game where you are controlling a tank, while shooting and avoiding enemies.

SHOOT ENEMIES!

The main mission of Tank Shooter is to fight enemies. Fight multiple types of enemies with your tank and avoid their attacks.

UPGRADE YOUR TANK!

Power up your tank with upgrades. There are currently 4 different upgrades with 5 upgrade levels that you could buy with coins

COLORS!

Customize your tank with 4 different colors. More colors are coming soon. And yes, your tank color will be saved.

EXPLORE THE MAP!

Explore 5 different maps with different shape and sizes. The maps will be filled with COLLECTIBLES! Currently, there are 2 different collectibles who can help you during the battle.

MORE INFO HOW TO PLAY

In PC:

[WASD] Move
[Left Click] Shoot
[Mouse Position] Aim
[Esc] Pause Menu

   
In Mobile:

[Left Joystick] Move
[Right Joystick] Aim
Shooting is Automatic

FEATURES
  •   Upgrades
  •   Customization
  •   Collectibles
  •   Save System
  •   Mobile Support
  •   Settings
  •   5 maps
  •   3 types of enemies
  •   4 tank colors
  •   And more… probably… ehhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
